title: Internet Subscription
description: Collects all specific details related to a customer's internet subscription plan, including data cap, connection type, and speed details.

xdm:dataCap.title: Data Cap
xdm:dataCap.description: Captures the data cap limit for the account, in megabytes (MB).

xdm:connectionType.title: Connection Type
xdm:connectionType.description: Tracks the type of connection type for the subscription.

xdm:downloadSpeed.title: Download Speed
xdm:downloadSpeed.description: Records the maximum download speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).

xdm:uploadSpeed.title: Upload Speed
xdm:uploadSpeed.description: Records the maximum upload speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).

xdm:selfSetup.title: Self-Setup
xdm:selfSetup.description: Flags if a customer is eligible for internet setup without a technican visit.
